course_main_structural_unit.address:
Narva mnt 18
51009 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Linear algebra. Vectors in space, their dot and vector product. Lines and planes in space. Functions, limits, and continuity. Derivatives and applications of derivatives. Antiderivatives. Definite integrals and their applications. Improper integral.
description.et: Kõrgema matemaatika kursus, milles käsitletakse järgmisi teemasid: maatriksid, determinandid, lineaarvõrrandisüsteemid, vektorid ruumis, skalaarkorrutis, vektorkorrutis, sirged ja tasandid ruumis, funktsioonid, funktsiooni piirväärtus ja pidevus, funktsiooni tuletis ja diferentsiaal, määramata integraal, määratud integraal, lõpmatute rajadega päratu integraal.

objectives.en: To give basic knowledge of higher mathematics needed in computer science and technology programs. The students develop basic skills in linear algebra and calculus through the topics and exercises covered in the course.
objectives.et: Anda informaatikas vajaminevad algteadmised kõrgemas matemaatikas. Õppija arendab arvude ja arvutamisega seotud õpioskusi õpitavate teemade ja ülesandetüüpide lõikes.

learning_outcomes.en: After passing this course the student:
1. knows about (uses of) matrices, inverse matrices, and is able to multiply matrices and find their inverses, when they exist;
learning_outcomes.et: 1. teab maatriksi, pöördmaatriksi mõistet ja oskab teostada tehteid maatriksitega ning leida pöördmaatriksit;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. knows properties of determinants, and is able to evaluate determinants;
learning_outcomes.et: 2. oskab arvutada determinanti, teab determinantide põhiomadusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. is able to solve systems of linear equations;
learning_outcomes.et: 3. oskab lahendada lineaarseid võrrandisüsteeme, teab Gaussi meetodit;

learning_outcomes.en: 4. is able to find dot product and cross product of vectors in space and knows about their applications;
learning_outcomes.et: 4. oskab leida ruumivektorite skalaarkorrutist, vektorkorrutist ning teab nende rakendusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 5. is able to find equations of lines and planes in space;
learning_outcomes.et: 5. oskab koostada sirgete ja tasandite võrrandeid ruumis ning leida nende vastastikust asendit;

learning_outcomes.en: 6. knows the definition of a function and most common classes of functions and their graphs;
learning_outcomes.et: 6. teab funktsiooni mõistet, funktsioonide liigitust, oskab ära tunda põhiliste elementaarfunktsioonide graafikuid;

learning_outcomes.en: 7. is familiar with the concept and main properties of limit, is able to find limits, and knows about continuous functions;
learning_outcomes.et: 7. oskab arvutada piirväärtust ja teab piirväärtuse põhiomadusi; teab pideva funktsiooni mõistet;

learning_outcomes.en: 8. is familiar with the notions of the derivative and differential, can find derivatives and differentials, and knows the most common applications of derivatives and differentials;
learning_outcomes.et: 8. teab tuletise ja diferentsiaali mõisteid; teab tuletise põhilisi omadusi ja oskab neid leida; teab tuletise ja diferentsiaali tähtsamaid rakendusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 9. knows the L' Hospital's rule and its applications;
learning_outcomes.et: 9. teab L'Hospitali reeglit ja oskab seda rakendada.

learning_outcomes.en: 10. is able to determine the intervals of increase and decrease of a function;
learning_outcomes.et: 10. oskab uurida funktsiooni ja teab, mis on kasvavad/kahanevad funktsioonid;

learning_outcomes.en: 11. knows about the antiderivates, and how to find them in simpler cases;
learning_outcomes.et: 11. teab algfunktsiooni mõistet ja oskab leida määramata integraali lihtsamal juhul;

learning_outcomes.en: 12. knows the concept of a definite integral and techniques to calculate it;
learning_outcomes.et: 12. teab, mis on määratud integraal ning oskab seda arvutada;

learning_outcomes.en: 13. knows common applications of definite integrals;
14. knows how to evaluate improper integrals;
learning_outcomes.et: 14. teab lõpmatute rajadega päratu integraali mõistet ja oskab seda leida;

learning_outcomes.en: 15. can choose suitable mathematical tools (formulae) for problems, and can use them to solve the given problems.
learning_outcomes.et: 15. valib ülesannete lahendamiseks sobivad matemaatilised kontseptsioonid (valemid) ning rakendab neid ülesannete lahendamisel.

independent_work.en: There will be 03 tests, 08 biweekly quizzes, and a (written) final exam. There will be no independent assignments. Tests and quizzes and final exam carry in total 196 marks. Up to 04 marks are associated with the attendance in Practicums. Full 04 marks will be awarded upon attending at least 14 practicums, 03 marks upon attending at least 12 practicums, 02 marks upon attending at least 10 practicums and 01 mark upon attending at least 08 practicums.  Please check Moodle regularly for the up-to-date information about tests, quizzes and the final exam.
independent_work.et: There will be 03 tests, 08 biweekly quizzes, and a (written) final exam. There will be no independent assignments. Tests and quizzes and final exam carry in total 196 marks. Up to 04 marks are associated with the attendance in Practicums. Full 04 marks will be awarded upon attending at least 14 practicums, 03 marks upon attending 12 or 13 practicums, 02 marks upon attending 10 or 11 practicums and 01 mark upon attending 08 or 09 practicums.  Please check Moodle regularly for the up-to-date information about tests, quizzes and the final exam.

description.en: Your actual numeric score will be scaled according to the predefined total of 35 points. For example, if you score 40/50 on a test, then your marks on that test will be scaled to 28/35.
description.et: Test 1 [35 points]

description.en: Your actual numeric score will be scaled according to the predefined total of 35 points. For example, if you score 40/50 on a test, then your marks on that test will be scaled to 28/35.
description.et: Test 2 [35 points]

description.en: Your actual numeric score will be scaled according to the predefined total of 35 points. For example, if you score 40/50 on a test, then your marks on that test will be scaled to 28/35.
description.et: Test 3 [35 points]

description.en: There will be 08 quizzes in total. Your marks on each quiz will be scaled out of 2. for example, 8/10 on a quiz will mean 1.6/2.
description.et: Biweekly Quizzes [16 points]

description.en: There will be a written final exam (in one part). Your score on the final exam will be scaled out of 75. For example, 85/100 will be counted as 63.75/75
description.et: Final Exam [75 points]

grade_evaluation.en: The final marks will be calculated by adding the scaled marks (as described above) from Tests, Quizzes, and the Final Exam. For example, 29/35, 32/35, 35/35 on the tests, 11/16 on the quizzes, and 70/75 on the final exam will add up to 29+32+35+11+70=177 out of 200 (or 90%). And if the student has attended 13 practicums, s/he will get 03 additional marks, bringing the final marks 180. The numeric grades will be converted to letter grades according to the criteria given below.
grade_evaluation.et: The final marks will be calculated by adding the scaled marks (as described above) from Tests, Quizzes, and the Final Exam. For example, 29/35, 32/35, 35/35 on the tests, 11/16 on the quizzes, and 70/75 on the final exam will add up to 29+32+35+11+70=177 out of 200 (or 90%). And if the student has attended 13 practicums, s/he will get 03 additional marks, bringing the final marks 180. The numeric grades will be converted to letter grades according to the criteria given below.

debt_elimination.en:
1) You will have the option to retake Test 1, Test 2 and Test 3, only once. If you retake a test, then your marks from the retake will be counted.
2) There will be no retakes for the quizzes.
3) You can retake the final exam only if you fail it in the first attempt.
4) A zero mark will be awarded if a quiz, test, or exam is not written without a legitimate excuse (that includes emergencies such as sickness or accident).
5) An appropriate proof (for example a doctor's note or a document from police) may be asked if you are missing an exam due to an emergency situation. An alternate arrangement, in legitimate cases, will be made on a case-to-case basis.
6) It is advised not to make any travel plans before you know the dates of your final exams.
debt_elimination.et:
1) You will have the option to retake Test 1, Test 2 and Test 3, only once. If you retake a test, then your marks from the retake will be counted.
2) There will be no retakes for the quizzes.
3) You can retake the final exam only if you fail it in the first attempt.
4) A zero mark will be awarded if a quiz, test, or exam is not written without a legitimate excuse (that includes emergencies such as sickness or accident).
5) An appropriate proof (for example a doctor's note or a document from police) may be asked if you are missing an exam due to an emergency situation. An alternate arrangement, in legitimate cases, will be made on a case-to-case basis.
6) It is advised not to make any travel plans before you know the dates of your final exams.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
